title: 关于bedwars插件
txt_content:
插件用的是下列这款起床战争最新版版本
https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/bedwars-eggwars.28113/

wiki链接
https://bitbucket.org/jer3m01/bedwars/wiki/Home

下面是bedwars的wiki写的
Bungeecord configuration
To setup one arena per server you will first have to change the following options in config: * TO-DO
本人表示不知道写在哪一项，请求好心人帮忙


下面是config配置文件
Vault:
  Enable: false
BungeeCord:
  Main Server:
    Enable: false
    Arena:
      Arena1:
        BungeeCord Server Name: bw1
        Players Per Team: 1
        Islands: 8
      Arena2:
        BungeeCord Server Name: bw2
        Players Per Team: 2
        Islands: 4
  Arena Server:
    Enable: false
    Arena Name: Hollow
Selector:
  Use Old: true
  Map Item: MAP
  Inventory:
    Main: Play Bedwars
    Arena: Select arena
    Team Selector: Select team
  Lore:
  - '&8%bedwars_arena_mode%'
  - ' '
  - '&7Players: &a%bedwars_arena_online%/%bedwars_arena_max%'
  - '&7State: &a%bedwars_arena_state%'
  - '  '
  - '&eClick to play!'
Items:
  Leave:
    Give On Join: true
    Material: 355
    Durability: 0
    Name: '&c&lLeave &7(Right Click)'
    Slot: 8
  Team Selector:
    Give On Join: true
    Material: 347
    Durability: 0
    Name: '&f&lTeam Selector &7(Right Click)'
    Slot: 0
  Kit Selector:
    Give On Join: true
    Material: 54
    Durability: 0
    Name: '&7&lKit Selector &7(Right Click)'
    Slot: 1
  Arena Selector:
    Give On Join: true
    Material: 345
    Durability: 0
    Name: '&e&lSelect Arena &7(Right Click)'
    Slot: 0
  Stats:
    Give On Join: true
    Material: 339
    Durability: 0
    Name: '&c&lStats &7(Right Click)'
    Slot: 1
  Back:
    Give On Join: true
    Material: 341
    Durability: 0
    Name: '&a&lBack to Lobby &7(Right Click)'
    Slot: 8
  Party:
    Give On Join: true
    Material: 352
    Durability: 0
    Name: '&d&lParty &7(Right Click)'
    Slot: 4
Options:
  Main Server: Hub
  Play Command: bw play
Spectator:
  Gamemode: 0
  Title: '&e&lGAME OVER!'
  Subtitle: You are spectator!
  Item:
    Teleporter:
      Material: 345
      Name: '&e&lTeleport &7(Right Click)'
      Slot: 0
    Settings:
      Material: 404
      Name: '&b&lSpectator Settings &7(Right Click)'
      Slot: 4
Reward:
  Bed Destroy:
    Coins: 5
    Command: false
    Commands:
    - give <PLAYER> diamond 1
  Kills:
    Coins: 1
    Command: false
    Commands:
    - give <PLAYER> diamond 1
  Wins:
    Coins: 10
    Command: false
    Commands:
    - give <PLAYER> diamond 1
Lobby Reward:
  Wins:
    Command: false
    Commands:
    - crate key <PLAYER> diamond
  Lose:
    Command: false
    Commands:
    - crate key <PLAYER> dirt
Arena:
  Bed Type: BED_BLOCK
  Default Kit: Default
  Map Size: 250
  Waiting Time: 10
  Round Time: 6
  Material:
    Iron: IRON_INGOT
    Gold: GOLD_INGOT
    Diamond: DIAMOND
    Emerald: EMERALD
    Diamond Skull: DIAMOND_BLOCK
    Emerald Skull: EMERALD_BLOCK
  Generator:
    Time:
      Iron: 1
      Gold: 5
      Diamond:
        '1': 30
        '2': 15
        '3': 5
      Emerald:
        '1': 60
        '2': 30
        '3': 15
  Team Selector: true
  Kits: false
  PvP Lobby: false
Party:
  Use Party And Friend Hook: false
  Enabled: true
  Invite Timeout: 60
  Offline Timeout: 300
  Main GUI:
    Name: '&6Party'
    Invite Item:
      Name: '&aInvite a Player'
      Item: STAINED_CLAY
      Durability: 13
      Lore:
      - '&eClick to invite a player'
    Members Item:
      Name: '&7Members'
      Item: SKULL;%partyleader%
      Durability: 0
      As Member Lore:
      - '&eClick to list the members'
      As Leader Lore:
      - '&eClick to manage the members'
    Leave Item:
      Name: '&4Leave'
      Item: STAINED_CLAY
      Durability: 14
      Lore:
      - '&cClick to leave the party&7,'
      - '&7if you are the leader another player'
      - '&7will be promoted'
    Close Item:
      Name: '&cClose'
      Item: BARRIER
      Durability: 0
      Lore:
      - '&eClick to close.'
  Members GUI:
    Name: '&7Party Members'
    Member Item:
      Name: <STATUS> &7%playerdisplay%
      Item: SKULL;%player%
      Durability: 0
      As Member Lore: []
      As Leader Lore:
      - '&eRight Click to promote.'
      - '&eLeft Click to kick.'
    Back Item:
      Name: '&aBack'
      Item: ARROW
      Durability: 0
      Lore:
      - '&eClick to go back to the previous menu.'
Scoreboard:
  Enabled: true
  Lobby: true
  Waiting: true
  In Game: true
Shop:
  Armor:
    Chain:
      Keep On Death: true
      Replace With: LEATHER
    Iron:
      Keep On Death: true
      Replace With: CHAIN
    Diamond:
      Keep On Death: true
      Replace With: IRON
    Elytra:
      Keep On Death: false
      Replace With: LEATHER
    Chain Elytra:
      Keep On Death: false
      Replace With: CHAIN
    Iron Elytra:
      Keep On Death: false
      Replace With: IRON
    Diamond Elytra:
      Keep On Death: false
      Replace With: IRON_ELYTRA
Per World:
  Whitelist:
    Enable: false
    Worlds:
    - world
  Blacklist:
    Enable: false
    Worlds:
    - world_the_nether
    - world_nether
Stats:
  Inventory:
    Title:
      Profile: '&eProfile'
      Achievement: '&eAchievements'
  Item:
    Profile: '&e<PLAYER>''s profile'
    Stats: '&aStats'
    Close: '&cClose'
    Achievement: '&eAchievements'
    Achievements: '&e<PLAYER>''s achievements'
    Back: '&cBack'
Do Not Edit This:
  Data2: true
